titleStmt.title: A reply to The Bristol-Narratiev [sic]; or, A more just account of the imprisonment and death of Mr. John Thompson minister of the Gospel given upon the credit of an honest man. Wherein the malicious relation, contained in it, conerning his death, is found false and impudent.

notesStmt.note: Place of printing suggested by Wing.
Issued with an anonymous verse elegy on John Thompson: "In obitum Domini Johannis Thompson, ..", on the two final leaves. The register is continuous with the main text.
Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London, England.
